nodes.text: Atrium 41 was located on a housing block on Atzerri. The atrium included balconies circling the structure and had a skylight on top. Atrium 41 had four apartments. It was in a dilapidated condition by 16 ABY. Joreb Goss lived in here and was visited in 16 ABY by Akanah Norand Goss Pell.
